name: Mecha Tactics
description:
-All actions avaliable to your mechas depend on the choice of parts for every mecha in your squad.
-Diferent mecha parts grant different abilities and stats.


-Every Ability has a set of effects(damage,movement,buffs).
-Every Ability targets differently with selectable targets or directional or area of effects.
-Every round mechas roll initiatives(1d20 + Initiative) whoever rolls higher acts first.
-Every act has a AP and a EP cost, Powerful skills will cost more.

Featuring:

-Randomized enemy squads.
-Randomized star systems.
-Grid based Combat.
-Local 2-Players versus mode.

Feel free to send suggestions, complaints and questions to nullbudgetgames@gmail.com
